LABEL.TEXT: CW/TDM: Show alive players / time at top
LABEL.TOOLTIP: Shows alive player count and round time at top
Use this option if you have FPS issues

COMBOBOX.LISTITEM: Show time at top right corner

LABEL.TOOLTIP: Only works if Bullet Marks are enabled
Show hit damage on enemy characters
Character legs stay in place when walking
Unlock camera direction, allowing you to aim freely during all moves
Better performance, lower RAM usage, less crashes.

LABEL.TEXT: Remove Custom Items From Weapon Rotation

LABEL.TOOLTIP: Enables the old killfeed in chat
